text: Takht-i-Bahi (or Takhtbai or Takht-i-Bahi or Takht Bahai) is a Buddhist monastic complex dating back to 1st century BC. It is located about 15 kilometers from Mardan in Pakistan's Khyber Pakhtunkhwa. It was listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1980 Category:Tehsils of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
title: Takht Bhai Tehsil
